statements: SELECT * FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_type FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives
SELECT * FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE initiative_type = 'Workshop'
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE initiative_type = 'Training' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_type FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY initiative_type ASC
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, initiative_type FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE end_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM diversity_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM diversity_initiatives;
SELECT description FROM diversity_initiatives WHERE initiative_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, initiative_id, participation_date FROM employee_participation ORDER BY participation_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, description, start_date, end_date FROM diversity_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT initiative_name, start_date FROM diversity_initiatives WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, count(participation_id) AS total_participations FROM employee_participation GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_participations DESC
SELECT * FROM diversity_initiatives WHERE description LIKE '%diversity%' ORDER BY start_date ASC

SELECT employee_id, initiative_name, participation_date FROM employee_participation JOIN diversity_initiatives ON employee_participation.initiative_id = diversity_initiatives.initiative_id WHERE participation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'

SELECT initiative_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_participants FROM diversity_initiatives JOIN employee_participation ON diversity_initiatives.initiative_id = employee_participation.initiative_id GROUP BY initiative_name HAVING total_participants > 5
SELECT * FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives;
SELECT description FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE initiative_id = 1;
SELECT initiative_name, lead_contact FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives ORDER BY initiative_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM initiative_feedback WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, description FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, lead_contact FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' AND lead_contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT participation_id, employee_id, initiative_id, participation_date, participation_status FROM employee_participation ORDER BY participation_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, employee_id, feedback, feedback_date FROM initiative_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants;
SELECT * FROM event_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT initiatives.initiative_name, participants.participant_name FROM initiatives JOIN participants ON initiatives.initiative_id = participants.participant_id;
SELECT initiatives.initiative_name, departments.department_name FROM initiatives LEFT JOIN departments ON initiatives.initiative_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT event_timestamp, event_description FROM event_logs WHERE action = 'UPDATE';
SELECT * FROM diversity_initiatives;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_diversity WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendees_count FROM event_tracking ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, description FROM diversity_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, department, ethnicity FROM employee_diversity WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM diversity_initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC, initiative_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, department, gender, ethnicity FROM employee_diversity WHERE department = 'Marketing' AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;

SELECT initiative_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM diversity_initiatives JOIN event_tracking ON diversity_initiatives.initiative_id = event_tracking.initiative_id GROUP BY initiative_name ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;

SELECT employee_name, SUM(hours_allocated) AS total_hours_allocated FROM employee_diversity JOIN resource_allocation ON employee_diversity.employee_id = resource_allocation.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name ORDER BY total_hours_allocated DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT event_name, event_date, attendees_count, initiative_name FROM event_tracking JOIN diversity_initiatives ON event_tracking.initiative_id = diversity_initiatives.initiative_id WHERE attendees_count >= 50 ORDER BY event_date ASC, attendees_count DESC;
